dc:title: On Pilgrimage - January 1969
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Relishes the quiet of her room in their new house and describes the work and cost of renovation. Connects the many forms of love and how hard love is. She notes with bitterness the bombing of Catholic churches in Vietnam.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 893 1969-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
